TrcCommonLib.trclib

Class TrcNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcNotifier

  • public class TrcNotifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a global Notifier object. There should only be one global instance of TrcNotifier. Once instantiated, it creates a thread pool with a fixed number of threads. If a component running on a time critical thread wants to make a callback to another component and worries about the callback may take too long to return, it can use one of the threads in TrcNotifier to do the callback thus freeing itself from waiting for the callback to return.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TrcNotifier.Receiver
      This interface provides a notification callback mechanism.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TrcNotifier getInstance()
      This method returns the global instance of the TrcNotifier.
      void sendNotification(TrcNotifier.Receiver receiver, java.lang.Object context)
      This method is called by a component that needs to do a notification callback using a pool thread.
      static void shutdown()
      This method initiates an orderly shutdown of the TrcNotifier in which previously submitted notification callbacks are executed, but no new notification will be accepted.
      static void shutdownAndAwaitTermination()
      This method initiates an orderly shutdown of the TrcNotifier and wait for its termination.
      static void shutdownNow()
      This method attempts to stop all active notification callbacks and halts the processing of waiting callbacks.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static TrcNotifier getInstance()
        This method returns the global instance of the TrcNotifier. If none exist before, one will be created.
        Returns:
        global instance of TrcNotifier.

      • sendNotification

        public void sendNotification(TrcNotifier.Receiver receiver,
                             java.lang.Object context)
        This method is called by a component that needs to do a notification callback using a pool thread.
        Parameters:
        receiver - specifies the notification callback recipient.
        context - specifies the context object to be passed back to the callback recipient.

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        This method initiates an orderly shutdown of the TrcNotifier in which previously submitted notification callbacks are executed, but no new notification will be accepted.

      • shutdownNow

        public static void shutdownNow()
        This method attempts to stop all active notification callbacks and halts the processing of waiting callbacks.

      • shutdownAndAwaitTermination

        public static void shutdownAndAwaitTermination()
        This method initiates an orderly shutdown of the TrcNotifier and wait for its termination.
